title: Avery's Home Alone Vocab - Sec {section}
theme: The setting is the world of the movie "Home Alone 3." Main characters like Alex Pruitt, his family, Mrs. Hess, and the four spies may sometimes be mentioned. Scenes may take place in Alex's neighborhood, inside his house full of traps, or around the snowy Chicago streets. These characters and places do not need to appear in every sentence.
